availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Griffith (McLean Co State Rep & judge)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Kentucky native. Married Amanda M. Griffith. Sheriff of the McLean County Court in 1854. Farmer in McLean County in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from McLean County from 1861 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 28. Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1878), 597. Find A Grave, "Judge Henry Griffith (1822-1885)," Memorial #82473508, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82473508/ (accessed August 18, 2017).
